html:
10.20.21  9:54 pm   Why do you have a problem defining the genre in which your music falls into? Be honest.

     am i supposed to want to be segregated

      What genre is your music. Google says you're pop.

     that's because i chose that category. the reason i chose it is because it's the most popular category. if you get to choose what section of the store your music goes in, of course you're gonna want to put it in the biggest section in the main part of the store. sometimes artists are not so fortunate, and the stores may choose to segregate them into less popular sections, often based on race or ethnicity, or various other prejudices

      You gonna let an algorithm define history? What is the genre?

     if you think it has anything to do with the way the music sounds, then i'd say go ahead and listen to it and then you'll know. If you ask me, i'd say i'm doing the absolute best i can

10.20.21  9:47 pm   whats your favorite word to spell wrong

      plam trees

10.20.21  9:35 pm   What are the dates in black text next to the links to the videos on the Reality page?

      the date each video was edited, and posted

10.20.21  9:10 pm   what's the crazy chord in the new song ("supposed to be")

     Gmaj7 over A

     and why does it work

     sometimes i wonder why any music even works at all

10.20.21  8:43 pm   who's the best author

      could be you

10.20.21  8:33 pm   Is the line in your new song "and all of the best dreams will be dreamed again" telling your viewers about a project you are working on?

      no. that line (and the surrounding lines) are hopefully some words of encouragement to anyone who has ever had a passionate vision or dream of something, and i'm trying to convey the reassurance that in due time those visions and dreams will return, and/or be fully realized. or at least, the 'best' ones can be

10.20.21  8:00 pm   is concrete a viable alternative to food

      no

10.20.21  7:06 pm   what is your favorite number of syllables?

      gotta switch between different amounts. that's the only thing that does it for me anymore

10.20.21  6:43 pm   Bill, how do I explain inexplainable feelings and thoughts to my therapist?

      explain where you were when you last felt it, and what else happened before and after

10.20.21  6:35 pm   Paradiddle or inverted paradiddle?

      if you show me i'll tell you which one it is

10.20.21  6:13 pm   Though you've shown a distaste for genre classification, do you still observe specific periods of music, like distinctions between March and Ragtime?

      in conversation, you can probably get away with the other person knowing what you mean, IF you already know the person pretty well, and they know what music you know, and you know what music they know. otherwise all bets are off

10.20.21  5:56 pm   do you consider perfectionism a blessing, curse, or something else?

      fake

10.20.21  5:12 pm   what is your opinion on caps lock

      badass

10.20.21  4:27 pm   Why are your songs always so smooth, calm relaxing and chaotic at the same time?

      sometimes i'm trying to reflect mother nature

10.20.21  4:21 pm   what are dreams made of?

      you

10.20.21  4:01 pm   if you could live for another 1000 years in addition to however long you live, would you?

      that sounds lovely, but i'm sure there's a downside to that

10.20.21  3:42 pm   what is your favorite song?

      i haven't found it yet, that's why i keep making new ones just in case

10.20.21  3:37 pm   hey bill, you always say you're working on a new video but now that the new video is out, what are you working on??

      writing a new song

10.20.21  3:15 pm   Looking back at previous videos, which ones were the most fun to make?

      i would prefer to make a new one to be the most fun

10.20.21  3:12 pm   Have you decided what your next song is going to be?

      yes

10.20.21  3:08 pm   have you ever considered making a full album

      i've never heard an album that worked for me as an album. that doesn't mean i can't do it, but it seems unlikely i could make that work. the only ways i can think of making it exciting enough is if it goes so far beyond an album that it would be no longer correct to call it an album. and i certainly wouldn't mind that. that's actually one of my goals

10.20.21  2:43 pm   is art disruptive in nature?

      yes, or constructive

10.20.21  2:19 pm   will you release a full album

      i've never heard an album that worked for me as an album. that doesn't mean i can't do it, but it seems unlikely i could make that work. the only ways i can think of making it exciting enough is if it goes so far beyond an album that it would be no longer correct to call it an album. and i certainly wouldn't mind that. that's actually one of my goals

10.20.21  1:52 pm   will you make a song about making a song?

      a lot of my songs are about that. perhaps too many of them are

10.20.21  1:28 pm   why do you make music

      sometimes it's the only way to explain anything

10.20.21  12:51 pm   are some of your songs trying to convey experiences/emotions that can't properly be conveyed in english?

      yes. that's pretty much my whole reason for using music

10.20.21  12:19 pm   what genre is ur music?

      plausible

10.20.21  11:59 am   Is the line "Today I woke up telling the truth. It seemed so true it sounded like music. And if I play it cool I can hear you: you almost told me what to do." in your latest song a reference to the this other line in "When I Get Older"?: "When I get younger, I'm gonna be a liar. I'll be lying about being so young. Then when I'm older I'll be more truthful, and then lie about singing this song." 

      no

10.20.21  11:58 am   do you give thought to using slant rhymes vs perfect rhymes?

      i find rhymes to be a trap. the best thing, i find, is to think about everything except the rhyme. then, various types of rhymes (and various other wordplay, etc) may or may not appear. hopefully in ways you couldn't have planned for

10.20.21  11:47 am   are you able to forgive yourself?

      sometimes

10.20.21  11:08 am   what was your favorite song to make

      i would prefer to make a new one to be my favorite

10.20.21  10:14 am   is wyoming a verb?

      it's either a gerund, a present participle, or a noun. Which of course begs the question, why is it called wyoming if it's already been wyomed

10.20.21  9:49 am   Would you like to meet Al Joelson's ghost?

      that sounds lovely

10.20.21  9:29 am   What is more than a dream?

      the whole world

10.20.21  8:28 am   what's the purpose of going to school?

      check out the architecture of the building

10.20.21  8:21 am   What's your least popular opinion? What about your most popular opinion? 

      i have no way of measuring the popularity of an opinion

10.20.21  7:16 am   when u say "i just found a better way" is it about song producing method.?

      that would be referring to a common feeling that i'm sure we all have, sometimes. that moment where you really think you're onto something that seems like it's working. and even though it feels passionately correct at that time, you also recognize that someone may disagree later. maybe even yourself

10.20.21  7:14 am   does rhyming come easy to you?

      i'm not sure, because i usually don't check to see if things rhyme. that seems to be bad luck

10.20.21  7:12 am   will things ever feel complete again?

      sometimes. it won't be always, because then that would seem empty

10.20.21  6:45 am   Are your dreams particularly vivid? Memorable?

     sometimes. it's hard to tell how many are not memorable because i don't remember those ones

10.20.21  6:34 am   why was the money video 2d

     to test the waters

     and also kinda weird

      the whole universe is weird. there's nothing i can do about that

10.20.21  5:53 am   In what genre would you put your Musik?

     normal

     And if you choose none, how would you name your own genre? 

      bill wurtz

10.20.21  5:46 am   What is it about answering questions that you have deemed useful or important?

      it increases my public relations skills somewhat

10.20.21  4:21 am   how many keys are there in music?

      how many do you want

10.20.21  4:07 am   Does it bother you that you could only write English songs?

      not really, although it is tempting to write in every language

10.20.21  4:05 am   is your new song in 7? it's a nice number and i like it

      the verses could be notated in 7/4 if you don't mind really long bars. however, the other sections are all just 4

10.20.21  3:36 am   every time i try to pull myself up to work harder i just crash down further and further. is there any way i can stop this cycle and actually do the things that i know will matter in my life?

      yes. i don't know specifically how you're going to do it, but i know you will. there's at least 10 ways

10.20.21  3:09 am   on a scale of one to two, how happy are you?

      1.5

10.20.21  3:06 am   What do you do when you feel extra lazy?

      make some fitness goals

10.20.21  2:56 am   whats your thoughts on your most recent song?

      i try not to think about it anymore
